Reviews.Title: “Planning a return”
Reviews.Author: Jan68127
Reviews.Content: My siblings and I spent a week at the Aku Tiki last year and thoroughly enjoyed it. The rooms were neat and clean, the staff extremely helpful and did everything they could to see that we had a good time. We appreciated the breakfast buffet and the happy hour. The pool area was always clean and tidy and we had such a great time at the pool bar with Benson the bartender!! We will be back this week and we're all looking forward to a wonderful time.

Reviews.Title: “crack head hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rick S
Reviews.Content: I found a crack pipe and syringe on the desk in my room. When I went down to show the front desk what I found the women working there didn't seem surprised. One didn't even look up from her computer screen. All they offered was a "upgraded" room. The "upgraded" room was just as filty. The first room must not have been cleaned or the maid would not have left it on the desk. I assume either the maid was the one smoking in there or a staff member went in there for a quick smoke. If it wasn't past midnight I would have left. I slept with my clothes on, one eye open and my Kimber 45 acp by my side. This is a crack hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion & Holiday Weekend!”
Reviews.Author: Alison B
Reviews.Content: Absolutely fantastic.....that describes it perfectly. Let me start by saying how helpful all the staff was and accommodating to such a large party. There were about 30 of us there for a family reunion/65th wedding anniversary/holiday weekend. That alone can seem like a daunting task but the staff made it look easy. The pool was very large and clean and towels were easily accessible. The beach was right there, just steps away and even a grassy lawn with lounge chairs and umbrella tables & chairs. An outside bar, ping pong table and a couple of covered tables for shade when needed. One of the biggest reasons for staying there (sight unseen) was because they have a restaurant on site and we wanted to have a big family dinner so no one had to driver anywhere. The staff did a great job and they have a "free" cocktail hour..no really it's totally "free"! My only suggestion is that if you have a large party for dinner make sure they know how many in advance. I did that for the Anniversary dinner but not the next night and they already had a large party in there and it was difficult for them and a little stressful for all. That was completely my fault....not theirs. I can't say enough positive things about our stay. They just know how to do it "right"! I hope the owners and the staff never change.

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Beachfront Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Biglo119
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed a very pleasant weekend here! Will keep this on our short list for future trips to Daytona Beach! Good breakfast buffet...nice staff...attractive pool area with a short walk to beach. Great experience!

Reviews.Title: “This is our favorite place to stay in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: Michelle Grottl... W
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to the Aku Tiki for the last 18 years. This year we had 3 generations of us staying at the beach. All the staff was very friendly and helpful. Benson was the best! He kept young and older alike entertained and he really seems to enjoy his work. The best pool around and so clean. We can't wait to get back to the beach!! Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel on the beach!!”
Reviews.Author: dondee96
Reviews.Content: First time at a Best Western and I was impressed, right on the water, we had a side ocean view this is right across from 7-eleven and a block from winn dixie which was very convenient as we had a kitchen area in our room... easy parking, the rooms were a great size with a little kitchen area-- the ice machines always had ice which was great. :) They had a wonderful hot breakfast and the cocktail hour was an added pleasure. We also ate at the restaurant there (the Traders) which was very good. The pool area was relaxing with music playing and also a big kiddie pool with the bar tender blowing bubbles to the kids they had tiki hut to get drinks you can play shuffel board or ping ping or go down the steps to the beach. The staff was extremely helpful and very nice to talk to I would definitely stay there again great place with reasonable prices!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: BornToTravelBrit
Reviews.Content: Right on the golden sand beach that stretches for miles! Offers free breakfast daily and free cocktail hour every evening. All you can eat fish every evening for 12.99. Staff was very friendly, pool was great, room was adequate but if you slept in they did not come back to service the room (hey I'm on vacation did I care? Not really!), free cookies and newspaper. Public areas very nicely decorated, large screen TV to watch the Olympics. I would stay there again. The Jolly shuttle goes by every hour for $1.25, some stores will give you a 24 hour bus pass for free!

Reviews.Title: “Above my expectations!!”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Y
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed here for several days with my family in July of 2012. I must say we all enjoyed our stay and would love to return. This hotel is very family friendly, my two girls 6&9 loved happy hour, they learned about Shirley Temples! Who don't love free drinks? The list to choose from was quite tasty. Just be sure to tip the bartenders! The things to do here are endless, from swimming in a very large pool or the nice size kiddy pool to playing shuffle board, basketball or ping pong. The Tiki bar was another plus because you didn't have to get all dry to grab a nice cold drink. The location is with-in walking distance to shops and stores. The access to the beach is as easy as 123. The free breakfast each morning was a nice treat also, again tip the attendants that keep the ever ending supply coming out. Rooms are nice sized and well equipped with microwave & small frige, the patio from the room is very nice to just sit and relax and watch the ocean. The laundry room was nice to have also, we had all clean clothes when we checked out. The indoor pond was an exciting surprise for us all. Everyone was super friendly, even the other guest! We would love to come and stay here again. I had a wonderful experience here!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff but hair on sheets”
Reviews.Author: kskifsta
Reviews.Content: We checked in based on the great reviews in trip advisor, 10 minutes later checked out...there were hairs in both of the beds in our room and the carpets did not appear vacuumed. The staff was extremely apologetic and provided either a full refund or a new room but hair on sheets is a deal breaker for me so we took the refund.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and Service!!!”
Reviews.Author: Marty P
Reviews.Content: We traveled with a group of 70 including teenagers and adults. The hotel accommodated us exceptionally well and worked extra hard to make our stay pleasant. The staff was friendly and the rooms were clean. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it here! Very clean and right on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: ohiomrspj
Reviews.Content: We called ahead to the Aku Tiki Inn from the road because we did not have reservations at the hotel. We were only spending one night in Daytona Beach, and this hotel did not accept reservations for only one night on the weekend. I was happy we could get in since we were calling at the last minute for a Saturday night. I was impressed by the hotel's website and reviews, and wanted to see what it was like. We got an excellent room oceanfront on the 4th floor. The view was fantastic! The balcony is mostly adobe, so it was very sturdy and had no rails that could pose a safety risk. There were 2 chairs and a small table on the balcony as well. The room had a small kitchen, a table, 2 queen beds, a tv and a desk. We had plenty of space for our family of 4 and plenty of places to sit. We did not have a sofabed, but our sons shared a bed with no trouble since it was a queen size bed. The bathroom had a vanity and a shower in the tub. It was all very clean with nice towels and large wash cloths. We had plenty of toiletries and plastic cups as well. We were at the end of the hall, so the kitchen had a window and we also had the large sliding glass doors to the balcony, so there was plenty of natural light. The beds were comfy and the linens smelled fresh and clean. We all slept well. The whole hotel was very clean and tastefully decorated. Traders was a nice comfy restaurant with a decor that matched the rest of the hotel. We enjoyed the free breakfast buffet at Traders in the morning. There were hot and cold choices and plenty of seating. THe attendant kept the food coming as it got a busy for breakfast. We had arrived at the hotel in time for the manager's reception that offered free drinks, but we wanted to get down to the beach right away, so we missed the reception. This is a smoke-free hotel and family friendly. I would recommend it highly to anyone looking for a family place to stay in Daytona. The parking is a little tight. There is vehicle traffic on the beach right behind the hotel, but it is a nice area of Daytona. We enjoyed the beach and had no problems. We did not use the outdoor pool or play any of the games they had out at Aku Tiki, but it all looked fun and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Value”
Reviews.Author: B D
Reviews.Content: Two adults, two teenagers shared a room in March. Very efficient kitchen area, comfortable beds, all in all very clean. Each evening had a happy hour, with free drinks for the teens, and free salad and wing buffet for free. On the beach, with a nice grassy area on the grounds with tables and umbrellas, shaded area with a ping pong table.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place to stay in daytona beach is best western aku tiki inn”
Reviews.Author: Art G
Reviews.Content: This is A very clean place with the best staff in the world.No matter what your age you will love the place.Great restaraunt fair prices.Great view.The staff makes you feel right at home.Can not wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff - nice location”
Reviews.Author: jeeper57
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay - right on the beach front. The front desk staff was very friendly and the complementary breakfast had quite a few choices. The hotel itself is a little dated but everything was very clean. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a nice place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Last Minute Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Jessica B
Reviews.Content: My parents were in from Texas and we went to Daytona to meet them. Didn't realize we were going to stay the night. They staff was great. They stayed in 405 and love the room. Great view and lots of space. we were in 415 due to needing 2 queens. love then view of the ocean. The Restaurant was great. Everyone was very helpful. I work in the hotel industry so I am very picky. I for one can recommend this place. We plan to stay there again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “An absolute treasure”
Reviews.Author: andygroundo
Reviews.Content: Stayed for just one night during our honeymoon tour of Florida but could of happily spent a lot longer here. EVERY member of staff we came into contact with was pleasent and very helpful, nothing was too much trouble. A credit to Best Western. The room (405) was massive and spotless with an awesome view of the beach and sea.

Reviews.Title: “EXTRAS DO COUNT...”
Reviews.Author: BQQKS_12
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great & quite affordable.. Not only did it have clean rooms, great customer service plus right on Daytona Beach with a balcony and ocean view. We had a complimentary hot breakfast & Happy Hour from 5:30 to 6:30. The pool & garden areas were well kept & beautiful. There are covered ping pong tables and schuffleboard if you wanted to take a break from the sun. We are looking forward to a return visit.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: suzanne h
Reviews.Content: This is a gem of a hotel. My friend and I stayed here on Memorial Day week. The rates were incredibly low but value was fantastic. We had ocean view and pool view. The hotel was immaculate and easy to get to. Many shops and stores directly across from hotel i.e. Winn Dixie etc. The beach was gorgeous and water warm. Rooms have fridge, microwave and coffee pots. Hair dryers included in bathroom.Beds comfortable, both queen sized. Great atmosphere with music and outdoor bar by the pool with views of both beach and pool. The staff was terrific and I would definitely stay here again. Very family oriented. Many people were return visitors. Can't say enough about this hotel. Breakfast buffet also included which was outstanding. Will definitely return to this location again.

Reviews.Title: “Family Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Kocickasmom
Reviews.Content: We stayed with 30 high school students for a weekend workshop. The hotel gave us an affordable group rate and gave us the use of their downstairs conference room. The rooms are spacious with balconies angled towards the ocean, so everybody had a view. All the rooms on the south side overlook the pool, so we did have a tiny bit of noise, but nothing that was annoying. The northside rooms overlook the parking lot. The bathroom was huge, but did not have a fan so it got very humid after we showered. The room was a tiny bit musty and my allergies acted up by the end of the weekend. Loved the 'clean remote'. There is a very nice terrace between the pool and the beach. The restaurant closes at 9pm. They offer pizza which is delivered to your room, but this ends at 9pm when the restaurant closes. (I discovered this at 9:05pm). 7-11 is directly across the street and I-Hop is half a block to the north. The free breakfast was not so good. Scrambled eggs were ok, but the pancakes were fat, doughy, and crispy burnt black on the bottom. There was no butter, only syrup. The orange juice was standard frozen reconstituted - I never understand why Florida hotels don't offer FRESH oj. They did have yogurt available and some sweet rolls and sausage, which I didn't try. They have a free happy hour in the late afternoon and free cookies and newspaper in the morning. I was able to get onto the internet in the conference room, but not upstairs in the hotel room. The front desk offered to help me if I brought my laptop down, but it was late so I opted not to. The one elevator is slow/always busy, so I ended up using the stairs at each end of the building most times.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: HOTEL8888
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great. Outstanding customer service, speedy check in, clean room, nice pool, and close to the beach away from the crowds and busy walkways. Free breakfast buffet in morning. Would definitely stay here again. John and Teri P

Reviews.Title: “Good motel on the beach at Daytona”
Reviews.Author: David B
Reviews.Content: Our plans too us to Florida a day before our reservations at the resort in Orlando so we book a room in Daytona, a city we love and have been coming to for more than 20 years. The staff were pleasant and welcoming. The rooms were very comfortable, and the continental breakfast was very good--a great selection of fruit and protein as well as the obligatory carbs. We enjoyed walks on the beach both evening and morning. Definitely a place I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable & Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ajmill
Reviews.Content: The room and bathroom were both well cleaned, and the bed comfortable. We had an ocean/beach view and balcony. Parking was easy and only a couple of miles from the main area of Daytona beach (though not quite sure where the centre is?) We just stayed one night as a stopover and left early the next morning so didn't use the restaurant. There are other average to good eating options available in the town.

Reviews.Title: “Beach getaway”
Reviews.Author: lakekayaker
Reviews.Content: As a frequent visitor to the Space Coast area, I chose a 3 day weekend at this BW in Daytona Beach Shores. Pleasantly surprised with great views of ocean from balcony which also overlooked the Olympic-sized pool (very clean!). Happy hour very nice touch. Hot buffet breakfast was a nice benefit. Room was large & included refrig. & microwave. Direct access to beach for long walks & swimming in ocean. Will stay again when in Space Coast area. A visit to Ponce inlet Lighthouse was also worth the trip back into our history!

Reviews.Title: “Nice vacation location”
Reviews.Author: NINNIE_10
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this place many years ago and wasn't sure if it still was a good place to stay after all those years. We were pleasantly surprised to find that it had been updated and still had the Tiki warrior outside in the front. Our room had two queen beds and was pretty large with a balcony on the north side of the building. We could sit on the balcony and look at the ocean. We found the beds to be comfortable and the facility was very clean. We did not use the pool because the weather was quite cool. We also did not use the restaurant. It was a good value for the price which is generally high at all the motels on the beach at Daytona. I will recommend this motel to those who want a quiet and convenient location right on the beach. Thanks for making our stay special.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay, awesome views”
Reviews.Author: donnellyjen
Reviews.Content: We booked a room last minute on our road trip to Disney. When we arrived we were given an upgraded room at no extra charge. We had a nice sized deck overllooking the pool and beach. The views were great. The hotel and rooms were also nicely appointed, put you in the real beachy spirit. We at Trader's the hotel restuarant for dinner and took advantage of the compliementary happy hour. The food was good by hotel standards. The staff all around was great and I appreciated their honesty when I inquired about the restaurant using fake or real potatoes for their mashed potatoes. Not sure why they don't use real ones. Anyway the breakfast buffet was a nice bonus as well. The value for this hotel and the ammenties is great. If I were looking to spend more itme in Daytona I would stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay, good value”
Reviews.Author: ColoradoTraveler5
Reviews.Content: My sister-in-law and I shared a room with two queen-sized beds. The room was very spacious, with a good-sized closet and nice bathroom. There was a small refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker, as well as a large desk, in the room. We didn't use the balcony because it was quite windy while we were there. Everything was clean, the beds were comfortable, and the staff was accommodating. There is a happy hour from 5:30-6:30 each evening with free beer, wine and mixed drinks (tips are encouraged). Breakfast was a buffet that included eggs, sausage, pancakes, three cereals, yogurt, bread and bagels for toasting, juices and coffee. The pool, outdoor games, and a lawn are between the hotel building and the beach, though it's still a short walk. The beach is fantastic! A hose is provided at the steps to get the sand off yourself. The restaurant has a good "early bird" special though we didn't take advantage of it. We did eat at Trader's the first night. Salads were okay, and my clam strips were probably out of a frozen package; but my s-i-l loved the Manhattan clam chowder and returned for more for lunch the next day. There is a computer in the lobby, where we were able to print boarding passes for our flight home.

Reviews.Title: “Great place reasonably priced”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer M
Reviews.Content: The views are stunning and the staff here is awesome, especially the girl at the front desk. She was extremely helpful and accommodating. We will definitely return. Good location on the beach, easy to get to grocery, beer runs, restaurants. Would give five stars if they improved the restaurant, but bear in mind that you can eat elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: rkeats
Reviews.Content: Came down with my wife & 2 boys, 15 & 18. we all had a great time. Oversized rooms with refrig & micro in every room. All rooms have a deck that has a nice view of the ocean. cleaning staff was very friendly and accomodating to requests for towels, soap, etc. The free Breakfast and cocktail hour were great. Pool was nice and being right on the beach was awesome. You can tell that they don't let you check in if you are under 21. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Decent stay! Clean and nice location”
Reviews.Author: nitadj33
Reviews.Content: Me, my husband and two sons visited the Daytona area from 3/23-3/25 for a quick weekend getaway. My first impression from the outside of the hotel was 'anything goes'. No, it's not very impressive from the outside when you first arrive, but the friendliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the rooms more than makes up for the lack of luster. Afterall, it's not a 5 star, but it was a clean and friendly place. We were there during a "BRING IT ON" convention (cheerleaders), so there were tons of teeny boppers and their parents in the hotel, making it crowded and loud at times. I was thrilled that I picked to have my room on the 5th floor, b/c otherwise, those that were on the 2st floor really suffered for 2 days full of noise. The rooms were BIG! Very spacious with lots of space, micro-fridge and in room safe. The bathroom is small, but who cares? I wasn't there for the bathroom. Every room has either a side view of the ocean or ocean front which was a big plus. Rooms were extremely clean, beds were a little on the firm side, but nevertheless comfy. The remotes are sanitized between guests which was a nice touch. My boys enjoyed the pool, basketball area, bean bag toss, and beach area immensely. The sand was like powder! Wonderful weather and the water was warm. They have a FREE hot breakfast in the morning with eggs, sausage, french toast, pancakes, danishes, cereals, and fruits. They even have free cookies out in the evenings at the front desk for guests, as well as FREE drinks for a happy hour from about 5-6pm! The hotel is located right across the street from an IHOP and a Winn Dixie, and a couple of miles down from the VERY busy section near the convention center. Great service, clean, nice atmosphere. I would recommend to anyone and would consider staying again :)

Reviews.Title: “Great pool - our favorite hotel in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: fullowynn
Reviews.Content: Aku TIki is our favorite hotel in Daytona Beach - we all love the big, beautiful pool deck right on the beach, and our kids are just fascinated by the indoor koi pond! The rooms are always clean and fresh, everyone is as nice as can be, and it's just a really nice getaway. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “Always A Great Time”
Reviews.Author: djm6107
Reviews.Content: We visit the Best Western every year and are always welcome with pleasant and courtesy indviduals. Rooms are large, offer a "free" breakfast buffet and nightly "happy hour". Can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Coming back to Aku Tiki again.”
Reviews.Author: ThePlaces_11
Reviews.Content: We are coming back to Aku Tiki for the third time only with two more family couples. This place is great. The pool, the beach, the staff, rooms, dining, just couldn't ask for better. Oh yes I forgot to mention, we already have reservations for ocean front rooms. Life is good at the Aku Tiki. Will see y'all in a couple of weeks. From upstate New York.

Reviews.Title: “such a nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: travelingabba
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful place to visit when you go to the beaches in Florida. Every time I stay, I always have such a nice and clean room and they have updated since the last time I was here. Daytona Beach is so wonderful and I love the area to view the oceans. I wish I had these beds at my home because they are so much more comfortable. I enjoy the coffee and breakfast at the restaurant downstairs. Such wonderful wait staff.

Reviews.Title: “Kids had a blast!”
Reviews.Author: scrappingmama
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed in Daytona again. As always, we had a great time. This was our second time staying at this particular hotel. The pool was definitely the highlight!!! Even though the beach was right there (and gorgeous!!) the kids loved going from the kiddie pool to the big pool over and over again. They finally got a chance to try their hands at ping pong too. All in all it was great, the staff was super friendly and I noticed how happy all the other guests seemed to be too. It was a great atmosphere. Oh and we even saw a guy writing out his proposal in the sand <3.

Reviews.Title: “Upbeat staff to assist!”
Reviews.Author: LittleBeeOregon_USA
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed my stay here. I'm partial to New Smyrna Beach, but this hotel is situated far enough from the main downtown that it offers a quiet restful stay on the beach. Staff are very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: KingGrape
Reviews.Content: Had a great stay there the weekend before the Daytona 500. They offer a nice breakfast bar ( just wish they would change the menu a little each day) If you like firm beds this is the place. The room was very clean and the restaurant in the hotel was good.I was happy to see they actually sanitize the TV remote and the mattresses are too. It really made me sleep more comfortably. I would definitely go back

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: bubbette54
Reviews.Content: We booked a room for one night during the Rolex 24 hour race at the speedway. I was surprised at the price of the room when I entered. It is very clean and tastefully decorated. The bathroom was ample size, the bed firm for both of our bad backs. I would definitely stay here again if we are visiting Daytona again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Oceanfront Value”
Reviews.Author: Chandralovzit
Reviews.Content: As I was traveling w/my family & teen children for a cheer competition, it was & always is very important to get the most bang for our buck! I have to admit, I was a little leary about staying with BW due to not having great experience with them in the past. That said, I was very pleasantly surprised!! For $220, I booked the 2Q balcony oceanfront, for two nights. This room had modern amenities, a large bathroom, Lg balcony w/ 2 chairs & a small table, even a kitchette w/stove! Free hot buffet brkfst was just ok, but, the way I see it, it was food! Based on the reviews from other parents staying at other local hotels, they paid more for less & that made me appreciate my experience all the more!!

Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: Nosassenach
Reviews.Content: This was the nicest BW we stayed in on this trip and the cheapest. We were welcomed warmly with a BW Rewards bag ( the best in many years staying at BW's) We were allowed a very early checkin. A fantastic sea view room. All the staff were very friendly and accommodating. The complementary drinks before dinner were a bonus We had lunch, dinner and breakfast in the restaurant the choices and quality for each meal were exceptional not all fried!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Curt A
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel from May 7 through to May 14, 2011. The hotel is very clean. My room was clean with a nice little kitchenette. Lots of parking. The staff at the front desk was very friendly and helpful. The internet connection was a little spotty though. It was almost across the street and down a bit from the grocery store. Good value for the money paid. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value with perks we weren't expecting!”
Reviews.Author: Jadecat
Reviews.Content: We decided on New Year's Day to make a road trip to St. Augustine and Daytona Beach. There were 2 couples. It was a spontaneous descision so we looked online for an inexpensive hotel on the beach and found this gem. We were a little nervous because it was pretty inexpensive for oceanfront views but we decided to try it. We were SO pleasantly surprised. A few scuffs here and there but overall very clean. Guestrooms were roomy with microwave and small fridge included. Nice beach view from the balcony. Decor has a sort of retro tahiti/1960's motel feel. Beds comfortable with lots of pillows. The staff we encountered were some of the nicest we've met at any hotel ever, friendly and helpful. It was too cold to use the pool but it was clearly kept sparkling clean. We couldn't spot a hot tub. Maybe it was located somewhere else if they had one. Easy beach access. The manager's cocktail hour was great with full sized drinks. Atmosphere in the dining room was cheerful and we were enjoying ourselves so much and liked our server so much at the cocktail hour we ended up eating dinner there. We were very pleased with our decision as the menu, although not huge, was adequate and the food turned out to be very good and prepared perfectly. The breakfast buffet, included in the price, was good with a nice selection. Although a basketball team came to breakfast just as we did the kitchen/servers did a good job keeping plenty of food out. When we checked out I noticed a platter of oatmeal cookies set out under glass for the guests. That was a nice upper-end touch! No this was not a 5 star hotel, but they did a great job trying to be and all of us agreed we would love to go back there sometime for a longer visit to the area.

Reviews.Title: “Stay at hotel at least once a year .. Overall nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: vinross
Reviews.Content: Overall the Aku Tiki Best Western is a decent hotel directly on the beach in Daytona. Overall they keep up the property. They keep advertising that the hotel is newly renovated. That was true 3 years ago. The hotel is starting to show its age again. The room wasn't as fresh smelling as it normally is. The carpets are starting to get a little grimey. The room was very comfortable. The bedding comfortable and clean. We had an ocean side room which was nice. We had a basketball team staying at the hotel with us so needless to say things get loud later in the night. Normally this is a very quiet and peaceful hotel, which is why i go, but the basketball team made a bit of noise throught out the night. The pool area is nice and clean. They have laundry service at the hotel as well. The breakfast served was pretty good. Nice hot eggs, sausage and fruit. Very good. Will go back again. The hotel should lose the tacky Hawaiin theme. It is a bit cheesey and if I didn't read trip advisor I would probably have not stayed. My favorite rooms all face the ocean. I love to hear the surf rolling in at night. It is very peaceful ... unless you have a basketball team shooting off fireworks at 1 in morning. ..LOL ....

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful value hotel with upscale Oceanside amenities.”
Reviews.Author: Nyzeta91
Reviews.Content: I just loved this hotel. Clean, spacious room with full min kitchen, nice front desk staff, heated pool, ocean views and direct accesses. Nice restaurant on site and plenty of free parking. Restaurants and shops in walking distance for miles. Fitness center is very very small but gets the job done in a pinch. Laundry facilities on site and in the surrounding area.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome one night stay”
Reviews.Author: Newmakorn
Reviews.Content: Delivering presents to family wanted to stay on beach. Stopped at Best Western and was welcomed with a smile and great overnight manager named Diane. She arranged a oceanfront room at a great rate. Obviously don't expect the Ritz but the service was as good

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place!”
Reviews.Author: Ednaj1
Reviews.Content: My friend and I just returned home about week ago and wish we were leaving out again tomorrow! This Inn is just wonderful. The front staff always helpful and I agree, the happy hour is great! The location cannot be beat and what a great pool area! A special thank you to Susie, the bar manager, she was just wonderful! Thank you to everyone there, it was a great trip and we will be back again! This had to be my 15th time staying at this location, as you can tell, would not consider changing.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: L C
Reviews.Content: I live on the west coast of Florida and some times I like to travel to the Atlantic side of Florida for a change of pace. Originally I stayed in Daytona Beach but decided to begin staying in the St. Augustine area because of the accomodations. A friend of mine mentioned he had stayed at the Best Western Aku Tiki in Daytona Beach and how much he liked it. After a 6 year exodus I decided to try Daytona Beach again and booked a room at this hotel. This occurred around this past April. Since then I have stayed at the Best Western Aku Tiki several more times and have always enjoyed it. My wife & I enjoy the atmosphere of the hotel along with the cleanliness and polite staff. They have a restaurant on site which serves reasonably priced meals and as of this date I have yet to have one that I didn't enjoy. Every time I've been there the staff are constantly painting and cleaning the property. It is well kept. One other feature that I've never seen anywhere before: Happy hour from 5:30 to 6:30 pm. Anything at the bar free!

Reviews.Title: “Aku Tiki”
Reviews.Author: keith j
Reviews.Content: the hotel was quite fine and the room was comfortable albeit it a tad dated. comfortable bed and room facilities were adequate . the breakfast room was very cold but the buffet breakfast was very good and great value . all in all a nice stay

Reviews.Title: “Hard beds and pillows”
Reviews.Author: vlc401
Reviews.Content: The staff and service are excellent. location is great. Traders bar and restaurant are very good, the prices are reasonable. We were there for Octoberfest on our motorcyle. We had secured parking. The only complaint myself and my husband had was how hard and uncomfortable the kingsize bed and pillows were. We book with best western hotels alot, but probably will not stay there again only because of the sleeping conditions.

Reviews.Title: “loved it would go back”
Reviews.Author: grannyl2008
Reviews.Content: staff very friendly and accommodating pool area great lunch at hotel restaurant very good

Reviews.Title: “Do'NT Wake Me Cause I am Dreaming, It's a Dream of Relaxing, Fun and FREE Happy Hours!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Theresa T
Reviews.Content: It is the second half of my trip and what a way it is to be ending the last days before heading home in such a wonderful setting, tropical settings throughout,rooms deluxe size double Queens smell fresh sheets and pillows!!!! Fridge that holds plenty of bevs and even could take my gallon size skim milk container this time. Hotel with cable relieved! The restraunt here you reached to on first floor by passing an atrium like foyer and going over a wooden bridge that below had a pond which holds the hugest catfish and goldfish we have ever seen. The Restraunt treats us their guests with free complimentary reception daily for hotel guests from 5:30-6:30 beer,wine and well selection mixed drinks. Was buzzed ontop of my buzz. They also have appetizer specials like $5 (8buffalo wings) Mozz sticks, Nachos and cheese and other selections for just $5 from 4-7pm. They serve a budget friendly menu which included the 8sliced pizza that I was suprised at how good it was. Fries cost $2.50 our eyes almost flew away in shock at the mountain of fries they plated us up. The other non specials on menu looked $$ price. We was told they have the best burgers and crablegs too by fellow guests. We had so much we already ordered that we offered the food around! New friends was made and we did talk people in to helping themselves. People laughing and having a great time. Bartenders layed back, wholesome and lively natured. Same with waitresses and back house staff that came out to see and hear as well as chime in on the fun. Outside pool was olympic sized outdoor had restroom areas and laundry room borderlined the outside perimeters of the pool side area. Other areas adjacent to the left of the pool was an upper level deck full of nice tables and comfy chairs with umbrellas surrounded by gorgiouse tropical exotic plants. My son kept trying to catch the little lizzards that would dissapear before you could even get close to them. The other end of the pool was greeted by a pavillion that held a ping pong table and a tiki bar which was large enough to seat dozen people are so arround. Also tables and chairs. Plenty of everything. The beach was few feet away and one of the cleanest, white sands I have ever gazed upon or stepped upon. feet was cool in the sun and had'nt we a rental car we would of been one of the many to drive right on the beach. The sand is as compact as concrete streets. We topped off are great night by walking down to Congo Minature golf where they had arcades and a alligator pit! Yes many little to mini sized gators were my son fed them little sliced hot dogs for under $4. They gave him a fishing type rod to feed them with. He had a blast. 7-11 right across the street from here, icecream stand, dollar general, I HOP and laundry mat and WinnDixie. Very convenient opposite of what we just experienced in downtown Orlando. BY which that hotel did make up for our rather misfortunes due to me complaining in a proper proffessional manner recieved comps for troubles. Just a tip people if you are unhappy speak up. Do not wait till you go home to complain. To me that is too late and your wrong to settle and grow angry later. You will find people want to aim to please. If they dont it's called write that one off and post. Tonight while in Daytona still till monday plan on heading down to boardwalk which is 3 miles from here, that is after happy hour and $5 wing and frie picking for fills to go out and explore and review some more. There is fireworks tonight and every Saturday locals tell so pays to chat with them. WE and especially my critic critical oppinion self are having a soo much fun and my smile is hard to contain. Thanks Best Western Aku Tiki Alohoa all hello's 5 Star review even if your on the old side, I forgive that little wiff of musky smell and one elevator for all the other wows.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!!”
Reviews.Author: jamboinocala
Reviews.Content: We booked a room at this sponsor hotel for the Surfers for Autism event to be held in Ponce Inlet, FL. They even had "Welcome Surfers for Autism" on their front sign. The staff was wonderful, very supportive and kid friendly. We got an ocean view room with pool view and king bed as we asked for. Very clean and nice, exceeded our expectations. Our view was wonderful from the balcony, we were on the 3rd floor facing the pool and ocean. Great for kids with pool, bean bag toss, shuffleboard, neat restaurant with koi goldfish pond at the entrance. We would definitely stay here again. Thank You Abu Tiki!

Reviews.Title: “Excellelnt Choice”
Reviews.Author: phyllis f
Reviews.Content: Our extended family absolutely loved the Aku Tiki Inn. This was our third stay there, and will definitely return there next year. The location, clean rooms, helpful and friendly staff made each of us feel welcome. If there is a minor problem in the room the hightly qualitied maintenace personnel (Lance & Steve) took care of it immediately. We usually take four trips a year, and this ranks with the very best we have stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “3rd Family Vacation at the Aku Tiki”
Reviews.Author: JDF20
Reviews.Content: We were treated so well and always have a great time at the Aku Tiki in Daytona Beach, FL! We have over 20 family memebers meet there every year and will continue to stay there every year because of the hospitality, friendliness and cleanliness!

Reviews.Title: “Loved It!!”
Reviews.Author: daddysgirl18998
Reviews.Content: We loved it! It was the first time we stayed on the beachfront (4-2010)

Reviews.Title: “SECOND YEAR BACK :)”
Reviews.Author: BEACHLOVER52553
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip back to the Aku Tiki. It is an amazing property, with amazingly caring and nice employees. my husband had had a heart attack the week we were suppose to arrive and could not go at that time. We had to postpone it for 2 weeks and i figured, here we go ,going to lose my spot , my room over looking the pool, etc. When i called, i didn't even need to explain why i need to switch dates, it was just DONE that quick. not one thing changed but the dates and i was on the phone less than 5 minutes !! there was no confussion when we arrived either. they were waiting and ready for us 5 minute check in also. they are WONDERFUL and so is Benson and the bubble machine LOL. thank you aku tiki for making it a hassle free relaxing vacation. !!!!! c ya next year !!!

Reviews.Title: “Will Return”
Reviews.Author: janiec1ca
Reviews.Content: Loved this place. The staff was friendly, considerate & helpful. The room was spacious, balcony overlooking pool & beach was fabulous. We had planned to just stay 2 nts. but loved it so much we deicided to stay 2 more. Terri was very helpful, stayed in same room for same great rate. The free happy hour in the bar is terrific, bartender Gina was great. Food in restaurant was above average & good service also. Will be back anytime I am in Fl. Only downside is the old elevator. It had some problems while we were there, but the view from the room made up for those issues.

Reviews.Title: “Hope I can get back”
Reviews.Author: Dreuf
Reviews.Content: I have made the sam review on another hotel, mixed them up since it has been some hotels on this trip. This is the correct review for this hotel: Located direct on the beach, clean rooms. I hope I will be able to get back there. Got there late in the evening, and have given them 4 out of 5 on the "quality of hotel service" since the lady in the bar didnt leave us one smile from we arrived until we left. The other staff was very friendly, even the cleaning lady had time to stop and make a chat with us.

Reviews.Title: “Great Clean Hotel..Top Notch!”
Reviews.Author: welovesummer14
Reviews.Content: My Fiance and I stayed here from July 1 - July 5, 2011 and i have to say we loved this hotel. I have no complaints at all about this place. We flew into Orlando and drove to Daytona for the NASCAR race on July 2nd. We arrived on Saturday around noon and the staff had no problem checking us in and directing us to the nearest beer store, ( which is directly across the Street) for it was about 30 degrees Celsius and the humidity was at about 4000%..It was hot! This hotel is located right on Daytona Beach, having its own private access out the back of the hotel through the Pool area and Tiki Bar, which was a nice little touch serving Ice Cold Beer and Tropical Fruit Cocktails! The Tiki Bar Charges straight to your room so no need for cash. Just be Carefull, there are no Prices posted and at that heat it didnt take us long to run up a $200 Tab when drinks are anywhere from $8 - %12 plus 20% Gratuity is added to each one. 1 Nice touch was tha In the hotel restaurant/bar there is a happy hour from 5 to 6 everyday, where drinks are Free to all hotel guest for that 1 hour. I Cant comment on the food for we did not eat there. The Location is Great, a little farther north up the beach so the beach was very spacious even for July 4th, we had no problem renting a couple chairs and an umbrella from the vendor on the beach who is Parked right beside the aku tiki. The Rooms were a little dated, but very clean and the air conditioner worked fantastic. Maid Service made up our bed everyday and tidied up our room for us as we were having a good time partying with the NASCAR Race, and July 4th all tied up into 1. Our room had a very nice View of the beach and ocean, and had a patio you could sit and watch the beach from. I would highly recommend this Hotel to anyone travelling to Daytona Beach, as it is affordable, has a Tiki Bar, and One of the cleanest on the Beach! If i had to Find a complaint, i would say the Elevator is old and 1000% Degrees.

Reviews.Title: “Looking forward to coming back”
Reviews.Author: MTnesters2006
Reviews.Content: Having grown up in the Central Florida area, I had always seen Aku Tiki on the beach and thought it would be a nice place to stay. However, I'll have to admit that given the age of Aku Tiki, I was a bit reluctant. Coastal Hotels require constant maintenance to maintain a clean, fresh feel. These folks have really got it goin on. The hallways and grounds were very well maintained. The rooms were well beyond my expectations. This place is clean, clean, clean. My wife and I are very particular about where we stay in hotels, especially coastal hotels. We look forward to a return visit next year.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, Tropical and most of all Clean”
Reviews.Author: sweet_ga_peach
Reviews.Content: We just returned home from a 3 night stay at The Aku Tiki. We absolutely LOVED this place !!! Upon arrival we were very impressed with the well kept grounds, the beautiful lobby & friendly staff. Check in was quick and easy, We were provided with 3 keys & a listing of recommended resturaunts. This hotel has interior corridors which we like, they were always clean & well lit. The outside of the hotel is very vintage, but the inside is very modern. As we entered our room, we immediately could tell it had been cleaned thoroughly & most of all sanitized. It smelled very fresh, clean & not like alot of rooms typically smell . The decor of the room was very tasteful & beautiful. We were also impressed at how spacious the room was. The bathroom was a bit small, but never an issue with us. Housekeeping makes sure you have everything you need each day. This hotel has mandatory daily housekeeping. If you don't want housekeeping, it has to be cleared thru the front desk. This hotel has high cleaning standards. We were able to see the cleaning supplies used on the cleaning carts. We saw only name brand DISINFECTING supplies on the cart and also Febreeze which I Love. Most hotels use stuff never heard of. It also appeared on the cleaning carts that the shower curtains are probably changed after each guest. That impressed me!!!! Their shower curtains are all fabric not plastic. I just can't say enough good stuff about housekeeping & how well this hotel is kept. The view from our 4th floor balcony was amazing. We could see both the ocean & the main strip. The only thing I would've liked better was a room with an ocean & pool view, but what we had was just fine. The pool is huge & very clean w/lots of chairs available. More chairs are available in the large grassy area behind the hotel as well as picnic tables & umbrellas. We really liked the gounds at this hotel. We've never stayed anywhere with a backyard. This hotel has a 10pm pool curfew to control noise. Our entire stay was very quiet & no guests were loud or out of control. We saw mainly families & middle aged couples staying here. The hotel also offers complimentary Happy Hour from 5:30 til 6:30 each day, soft drinks are provided for the kids & adults too if preferred. The lounge area is beautiful & comfortable w/lots of greenery & a large coy fish. A big flat screen TV is in this area too. The previous negative reviews just can't be true!!! I am a VERY picky person who never stays in older hotels. I usually stay in the new ones. After reading the good reviews & seeing the awesome pics, I decided to give this place a try. I'm so happy that I did. I learned that Old is sometimes better than New. We will definently return & recommend to others. I promise you will really like it here!!!!

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: rgc1
Reviews.Content: The Tiki is the best place to stay when you're in Daytona. We stay there every year. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. The manager's happy hour is, perhaps, the best in Daytona. Best hotel on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Cockroaches!”
Reviews.Author: familytravelerOhio4
Reviews.Content: We had reservations to stay here for two nights on our way back to Ohio from Disney World. At 11:30 on the first night in the room, I saw something run across the floor and when my husband got a closer look, he discovered it was a cockroach! It ran under the door before we could smash it. We have two little kids who had stuffed animals and blankies and we didn't feel comfortable staying in a room with bugs. So, we packed up our things and carried our sleeping children to the car and headed home at 1:00 in the morning. We had stayed at this hotel last year and it was fine, but we noticed other little problems that we could have overlooked like a stopped up sink and a dirty floor (the bottoms of our kids feet were black), but we couldn't overlook the roach. We paid for that night but did get our money back for the second night. Needless to say we were all disappointed about our beach vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Not what we thought it would be!”
Reviews.Author: mandi_09
Reviews.Content: My friends and I had planned a trip and we were very excited to stay in Daytona Beach for our second half of our vacation. We checked in to this hotel at approximately midnight and were served by a man who didn`t look like he knew much of what he was doing. When we booked with hotels.com we had asked for an oceanview room on any floor other than the first. When we were given our keys it was for a hotel room that was facing the parking lot on the first floor. Now I don`t know if it`s their procedure to try and give away the rooms that no body wants that they think some sucker will take or if it was just an innocent mistake. When we returned to the front desk to inform the clerk that the rooms assigned were not as requested he changed them and gave us 2 rooms side by side on a higher floor but pool view. The hallways are very creepy-looking with a hidious and harsh red colouring to them. When we actually got into our rooms there were stains on the carpet and the phone wasn`t working. We decided to check the matresses for bed bugs and thankfully there weren`t any; however on the matress there was a stitching that said MITEX on it and a date right underneath. My friends and I decided to look up what kind of trademark MITEX stood for and found out that they were a cleaning company that sprays matresses in order to get rid of bed bugs termites etc... so obviously some of these mattresses had been sprayed due to a problem with bed bugs in the past. My friends and I didn`t feel comfortable sleeping on a matress that used to have bed bugs crawling all over them and decided to leave at approximately 1 am to check out of this run-down shabby hotel into the Holiday Day In Daytona Resort right down the street. My advice to you is to not stay at this hotel because it wayyyy over priced and you can get a much cheaper deal at a 10 x better quality hotel down the road. We never got a full refund for the night that we never ended up staying! AVOID!

Reviews.Title: “Right on the beach, loved it!!”
Reviews.Author: kitkat10410
Reviews.Content: We stayed here a couple of nights. The oceanfront rooms (with balconies) look right out to the ocean. The beach is right below you. Golf cart rentals are right by the hotel on the beach. We rented one and rode up and down the beach ($45.00/hr.). Lots of fun! The rooms are great and the pool is big and clean. The rooms have a small kitchen in them. We ate dinner one night at the hotel's restaurant, Traders. We didn't really like it. The food wasn't that great. The hotel has a happy hour, I think every night, with some free drinks. Across the street and down a block is an IHOP. It is within walking distance, as is a Winn Dixie grocery store. Overall, we loved this hotel, loved the location, and loved the staff. We had a great time!!

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed out stay here”
Reviews.Author: itaskah
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not brand new, but it has been kept up very well. The access to the beach and pool are very easy. The pool is very large and was so much fun to swim in. Water did not burn your eyes. The rooms were a good size. We had plenty of room for our stuff and still move around. Did not eat at the restaurant so I can't comment on that. We had no trouble parking our car.

Reviews.Title: “Only stay here when in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: RedR1
Reviews.Content: $100 a night for a clean and nice hotel on the beach? Almost unheard of. What a great deal. This was our 2nd stay here and once again we had a great time. Everything was clean, rooms are nice, view of the ocean, great pool.This is ideal for families. Will be back for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: sparky817
Reviews.Content: I am very fussy about where I would stay, I checked out a lot of places before I decided to stay at the Best Western Aku Tiki Inn. We had a wonderful time the rooms were very clean and roomy. The staff was very friendly and the traders restaurant was very good and we enjoyed the happy hour in the evening.

Reviews.Title: “Found this great spot as a suggested place to stay for a wedding we were attending in 2008.”
Reviews.Author: gleeks07
Reviews.Content: Found this great spot as a suggested place to stay for a wedding we were attending in March 2008. We enjoyed the stay so much we have returned every year in March since. We stay for a few days as part of our Florida trip before heading further south to a family condo in Boynton Beach FL were we stay. The BEST WESTERN Aku Tiki Inn is located right on the beautiful Daytona beach. It is not the most modern of facilities but it is very clean and has all the ammenities you need for a great relaxing stay. We usually stay in a suit with the balcony over looking the beautifully gardened pool area. Every day the resturant has a free happy hour from 5-6pm. All the employees are freindly and accommodating. The efficiency suites have a small kitchen area complete with refridgerator, stove, microwave, cooking and eating utensils. The rates are very reasonable and I believe they have extended stay rates. You will enjoy your stay weather it is for a few days or a few weeks.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Daytona Beach Area Hands Down!”
Reviews.Author: inthebiz131
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Tiki for 6 nights with my 3 kids and friends. We loved our stay! The rooms were spacious and immaculate; the restaurant was very good and not too pricey; the pool deck is one of the best I've ever seen-great size pool and easy access to the beach. The rates are affordable and worth it! The staff was awesome and overall we were so comfortable and wanted to stay longer! Thank you to everyone at the hotel for having us. Julie was especially kind and friendly at the desk as was everyone else including Ward, Chelsea, Lisa, Terri.

Reviews.Title: “The best resort hotel in the Daytona area.”
Reviews.Author: shrek60
Reviews.Content: A clean, lovely hotel right on the sand in Daytona Beach Shores. A grassy area and upper and lower pool deck with abundant tables, lounges and fresh towels. Pool is always clean and crystal clear, surrounded by lush shrubs. Outdoor ping pong, shuffle board and basketball. Work out room with excellent equipment. Superb restaurant and bar with daily happy hour. Management and staff are always accomodating and friendly. Simply the best!

Reviews.Title: “High priced but worth the view!!”
Reviews.Author: raindrops66
Reviews.Content: Reserved room for one night, needed the room a second night and Terrie at the front desk worked her magic and got the room for us for a second night. when they were all booked up. Got to our room, the refrigerator knob was broke off, service came right up and fixed it within minutes. The TV made a crackling sound every time you turned it on like it was shorting out (lasted a few minutes each time then the noise went away), TV's need to be updated. Also, bathrooms are very small. Beds were comfortable. Rugs needed to be cleaned. Service was great. This room was pretty pricey, but what do you expect when you have a ocean front view.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean hotel right on the beach- and FREE happy hour every day!”
Reviews.Author: adjuster-jd
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights at this hotel as part of a timeshare tour package. Checkin and check out was quick. Our room was very spacious and comfortable for 4 of us and had a microwave and refrigerator. Our room was located next to the elevator so we had a bit of people noise in the mornings. Although our room faced the parking lot and we were close to the street side of the hotel, we did have an ocean view and we still had a good view of the ocean from our balcony. The pool was large and clean and the deep end was 11 feet deep. Plenty of room for everyone to swim around. The hotel is right on the beach with a hose and shower right at the foot of their steps for easy cleanup. The beach was clean all around this area. The location is in Daytona Beach Shores which is a little bit south of the hustle and bustle of the main Daytona Beach town area. There are lots of restaurants nearby and a nice mini golf place just a block away. The only reason I rate this hotel as very good instead of excellent is that their housekeeping staff shuts down pretty early in the day. We arrived late at night and slept in a bit our first day and housekeeping called about noon to say they were getting done and did we need anything. They did provide some towels which was really all we needed anyway. Not really a big deal though. The room and the entire hotel area was very clean and well kept. They did have a problem with the elevators one day for a short time. The maintenance staff jumped right on that and got it fixed after a short time. They have a free happy hour every day with free cocktails at the restaurant bar. You have to wear shirt/shoes to go into the bar, but there is an entrance right off the pool area so you can go inside and bring your drinks out to the pool. I don't know what this hotel actually cost since mine was paid for by the timeshare marketing company, but I would definitely recommend staying here if you want a clean comfortable room with enough space to move around. They have free internet as well.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great staff”
Reviews.Author: Hugothebear
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a couple of nights - the hotel is great enough as it is, but with staff like Julie at the front desk, it makes everything phenomenal. It's always nice to come to a hotel after a long flight and drive to see a smiling face with such a cheerful and helping personality. Staff like Julie really add the plus to the Best Western plus marque.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel, nice view, very clean”
Reviews.Author: Coady90
Reviews.Content: Really liked this hotel. had a great view, huge pool, very clean.

Reviews.Title: “the cleanest room...ever...and on a beautiful beach!”
Reviews.Author: BurgoyneOrlando
Reviews.Content: I was not sure what to expect, but really loved this place. I have stayed in more expensive places but never one this immaculately clean - every corner, every windowsill, every inch of the room was clean, neat, well-maintained and nice. I got up early one morning for a beach walk, and hotel staff were already cleaning off the sandy steps that led to the beach. Our group ate most meals at the hotel, and loved it. No complaints. Staff was friendly and accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel even better location”
Reviews.Author: rodger006
Reviews.Content: good hotel,pleasent staff, nice rooms, large heated pool, good restaurant, best location right on beach, corridoors a little tired but that is my only negative,will we stay here again? you bet we will thanks aku tiki.

Reviews.Title: “Another nice stay at the Aku Tiki ...”
Reviews.Author: vinross
Reviews.Content: 3rd stay at this Best Western in the past few years. I use this as a stop over hotel when coming in and leaving Florida. Don't judge a book by its cover. The hotel theme is Hawaiin. It looks a bit tacky but the hotel is one of the cleanest I have ever stayed in. The owners are always pooring money into this place. It takes a lot to keep up a property so close to the ocean. Something is always new when I visit. This time the room carpeting was brand new. It was so clean I took my shoes off while walking in the room as I do at home. The hotel folks pay a lot of attention to detail. There is never a scuff on any wall. Everything from the walls to the ceiling are always freshly painted. Everything is always bright, clean and fresh. This hotel itself is very old but because of the constant continued maintainience you would never know the difference. My favorite part of the stay is being able to hear the roar of the ocean while I sleep. The hotel draws an older crowd. Not sure how it is at other times of the year but it is always very quiet with the RV wal-mart crowd. I look forward to coming each year. The hotel should get rid of the pacific island theme. It doesn't work as a draw as I am sure it did way back when. Either way I will keep coming back. Happy travels.

Reviews.Title: “We will definitely come back to this hote!!”
Reviews.Author: S_Bruel
Reviews.Content: We will definitely come back to this hote!!. It worked really well for us. We are a family of 4 from Denmark in Europe, our two girls are 10 and 12 years old. The hotel has the layout and location of a fancy hotel, but on a small scale, I find those huge hotels too impersonal. Aku Tiki Inn is casual, friendly and clean. The pool has a good size and is heated even during the winter, which was our luck. Our girls love to spend the day in the pool. It also has an area with table tennis, basketball and another games which I don’t know the name of, a kind of curling game. The hotel is right on the beach, a beautiful beach with white soft sand and both the water and the beach are clean. The personal is very pleasant and helpful. One evening we went for dinner in the restaurant and we were looking after our 3 year old nephew. He was tired and hungry and wanted pancakes for dinner. I asked the waitress and she quickly understood the situation. She went into the kitchen and was able to work it out. This was a big help for us and we ended up having a really pleasant dinner. We can definitely recommend this hotel, it is value for the money and is very child friendly.

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel I have stayed at in the US in the last 5 years”
Reviews.Author: Bikerider01
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel and paid for it 10 months in advance for Biktoberfest. I wasn't sure this was wise but - this hotel surpassed all expectations. - all staff are friendly but unobtrusive - location cannot be bettered, handy to attractions but not noisy - pool is clean and bright, poolside is a nice way to spend a quiet afternoon - internet works a treat when you need it - right next to the beach, choose from the pool or the sea - supermarket and post office 50 yards away; gas station 100 yards away - bus stops right outside for those non-riding trips to the bars:-) - quiet rooms well appointed and cleaned by cheerful efficient staff - a biker-friendly hotel complete with special bike parking, well lit, roped off and security patrolled, hose and bucket and cleaning rags to wash the bikes - great value for the reasonable price I am hoping to get a room there again for Bike Week! Cnogratulations to the owners / manage and staff of this excellent inn.

Reviews.Title: “a good and reasonable place to stay”
Reviews.Author: olivejo
Reviews.Content: The staff here is friendly and efficent. Almost all room have at least a partial view of the ocean and beach. The rooms are spacious and very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful sunrise; good breakfast; and the almost private beach!”
Reviews.Author: Najmeh
Reviews.Content: I didn't bok in advance; but driving around the beach to find us 'proper' accommodation; this was the BEST value for the money. The bathroom was a little small for what seemed like a family suite; The bunk bed was uncomfortable. But the swimming pool and the lawn chairs on the ocean compensate for that.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, clean rooms, great pool, and wonderful location. We have a great time!”
Reviews.Author: gliterwave
Reviews.Content: We began our trip off at another hotel and were very unhappy with the condition of the rooms and hotel. We ended up receiving a refund and checking out the Best Western Aku Tiki Inn. From the moment we walked into the hotel we had a good feeling. The staff behind the desk were friendly and helpful. We asked to look at a room before putting money down. A man named Jay gave us a full tour of the hotel and gave us suggestions on where to go in the Daytona area. The pool was big and clean, and the beach was steps from the pool area. We had a great time!

Reviews.Title: “Don't let first impressions fool you!”
Reviews.Author: SquareCaller
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at the Best Western Aku Tiki, our first impression wasn't good. The front of the hotel was quite unimpressive, the lobby was small, and the desk staff explained that our room wasn't available due to several employees not coming to work that day. It was more than 3 hours before we could check in, and that was contingent on us taking a gound floor room fronting on the parking lot. The halway to the room was typical of a beach resort, with worn and dingy carpet. This is normal considering that people are coming in from thre beach and the pool, tracking in water and sand. However, the room was very nocely appointed, clean and spacious. Beds were very comfortable; room was clean ; bathroom was well supplied, with plenty of clean towels, washcloths, and hot water. The pool was convenient to the pool, beach, restaurant, and parking lot. It was also very quiet, with no outside noise, in spite of the fact that the hotel was quite full. The pool was nice size and extremely clean and well supplied. The restaurant was very good, with quality food, excellant service, (Chris was the best!), good prices. Happy Hour at the bar every night from 5:30-6:30 was a special treat. There was a poolside Tiki Bar and food could be ordered for the pool or the room. Convenient location to downtown Daytona Beach and Ponce Inlet made this hotel special.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel and have already booked another stay”
Reviews.Author: skleba6130
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Daytona to take our 3 year old son to the beach for the first time. We used trip advisor to find a nice hotel on the beach and this one lives up to all its great reviews. The rooms are big, the kitchenette was extremely helpful with a preschooler. We had dinner at the onsite restaurant (they gave us a 10% off coupon at check-in) and the food was very good. All the little things from fresh baked chocolate chip cookies in the morning to pool towels and a hose by the beach steps to wash you feet made this an awesome stay. In fact, we recommended the hotel to friends and have booked another stay where we can all stay together.. Two thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: “A nearly perfect beach vacation”
Reviews.Author: Louis4fun
Reviews.Content: Just returned from our vacation to Florida. Spent three days in Orlando doing the parks and then spent three days in Daytona Beach. We stayed at the Aku Tiki Inn and it was great. It is south of all the crowds and a perfect spot for relaxing with the family. You could hang by the pool, relax looking out over the beach or play in the ocean. Happy Hour from 5:30 - 6:30 was an added bonus - free cocktails. We would highly recommend this for families looking for a great place to stay. The beach was beautiful and there were only a few cars on this area of the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great family hotel, great value!”
Reviews.Author: Niccibabi
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in other hotels across Daytona Beach & this is the best one yet, perfect place for family or couples. Immaculate rooms and grounds, very relaxing. Location is great if you don't like all of the Daytona congestion, located at the southern part of the beach. Free happy hour every night from 5:30-6:30. The pool is a nice size and very clean as well. Just an FYI: the elevator is horrible, best bet is to take the stairs. I will definitely be staying at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay for the money”
Reviews.Author: riverratfamily
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night early in June 2010--had an oceanfront room on the second floor and the view was worth it. Upgrade to the oceanfront if you can. Rooms were huge, especially since we had just came from a 4 night stay at one of the Disney resorts with very small rooms. Beds were comfortable. We loved the balcony overlooking the ocean and got some very good pics. Didn't eat at the restaurant but drove uptown instead. Don't let the outside fool you as I was a little disappointed when we drove up, but most of the hotels on the beach look the same. Loved the location on the beach too. Felt safe and comfortable. Swimming pool looked nice, we spent all our time in the ocean or on the sand. Lots of chairs and umbrella tables around for guests to sit and relax at that were oceanside.

Reviews.Title: “I highly recommend the Aku Tiki for your next group event.”
Reviews.Author: rcaide
Reviews.Content: The 2010 Bandit Run stayed at the Aku Tiki resort for 2 nights. As the organizer, I had the task of finding 6 different hotels in 2 states for our yearly rolling car show. We stayed in various types of lodging from a normal chain hotel to a 4 star luxury resort to the Walt Disney World Resort. The Best Western Aku Tiki was hands-down everyone's favorite hotel. It is difficult to please over 150 people from different backgrounds, but the Aku Tiki managed to make it look easy. Karen (our group sales coordinator) went out of her way to make sure we had everything we needed. Be it a place to park the semi-trailer that travels with us or a hose to spray off the classic cars, no request was too big. The staff was friendly and efficient and check-in went smoothly. Everyone loved the cocktail hour and the morning breakfast buffet. The pool area with the oceanfront tables and seating was a group favorite. I know that the next time I travel to Daytona Beach with a group or for family fun; I will definitely stay at the Aku Tiki. The hotel is clean and well maintained and the staff is very friendly. I truly can't think of anything they could have done better. How often can you say that about a hotel stay especially one that had to please 150 people who came from all over North America? Give the Aku Tiki a try and you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: “I felt so safe and comfortable staying here while traveling by myself!”
Reviews.Author: sunshinegirl026
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I have stayed here and would not stay anywhere else while visiting Daytona Beach!. It is located directly on the ocean with stairs going down to the beach. The clientele was families or middle aged couples looking for a relaxing vacation spot, like I was. No spring breakers here! I ate breakfast and lunch every day by the huge heated pool. The on site restaurant food is excellent and priced right. The staff was very accommodating and friendly and my room was very clean and I loved the convenience of having a microwave and frig in my room. . I have a bad back and found the bed to be extremely comfortable with great support. Just wish they had a free shuttle to the DAB airport. The taxi ride was reasonable though, only $20.00.

Reviews.Title: “MY DAUGHTER ENJOYED HER 18TH BIRTHDAY”
Reviews.Author: msucooper
Reviews.Content: My daughter and some friends stayed here to celebrate her 18th birthday. She chose this hotel because it was close to the beach. The front desk staff was very nice and professional. The room was very clean and there was an awesome view of the beach. Since there are refrigerators in the rooms it is a definite "plus" that a grocery store is located directly across the street. My daughter and I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Stay away from the Traders Restaurant at Aku Tiki Inn”
Reviews.Author: John_B_FL
Reviews.Content: This evening, my wife and I ate at the Traders Restaurant located at the Best Western Aku Tiki Inn in Daytona Beach Shores The service at the Traders was good, but the food was some of the worst I ever placed on my palate My wife had the turkey sandwich which was okay, but then again how can you mess that meal, but the seafood was bad. They offered an "all you can eat" fish special on Friday night. Once I found out it was pre frozen, pre battered Pollack, I declined the special and chose the fried seafood platter instead; bad decision on part. The food was not only overcooked, but the grease they cooked this in had to be several days old. Most restaurants now sell old cooking oil to homemade diesel enthusiast. This batch needed to be sold as crude oil. I returned the meal and settled for a NY sirloin which was mediocre and literally left with a sour taste in my mouth. John B. Tampa FL.

Reviews.Title: “Great family trip”
Reviews.Author: mermaidwyc
Reviews.Content: I would strongly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a clean, reasonable in cost and well maintained hotel. Dale and his staff keep the hotel in great shape. We have been going there as a family for 4 years in a row and are always impressed with the constant good condition that this hotel and its ammenities are kept in. Keep up the great work. We will see you again next May.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay could not be any better”
Reviews.Author: dohalliday
Reviews.Content: Four friends /neighbors started out from Murrells Inlet SC to search for Lions Paw Shells Despite not finding any ( except in the stores) , we had a wonderful time at Aku Tiki Inn. The rooms were clean , the heated pool was great and with the ocean a few steps away, We were in paradise . Although we are from a resort area , close to the beach , We enjoyed our stay with you and would definitely come back!

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: 8Grand
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with 3 friends for 3 nights. What we liked most about this hotel was the the staff. Everyone was warm, friendly and helpful. The front desk staff gave some excellent reccomendations for restaurants and good directions. Our room had a view of the ocean and beautiful sunrises, The pool is huge and well maintained as well as the grounds. There are free cocktails every evening in the restaurant. This hotel is in close proximity to many attractions like the Cape Canaveal National Seashore, The Ponce Inlet Light House and lots of restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “I wouldn't go there ever again!”
Reviews.Author: notinterestedJax
Reviews.Content: Looks nothing like the pics online. The front desk staff is rude and unhelpful. the rooms are average at best, not worth wha they are charging! The internet conncetion is very poor. The maid service is poor, doesnt clean throughly. The over all experienc sucked period!

Reviews.Title: “This is a great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: southernsam
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel! We stayed for 2 nights during Bike Week 2010 while on holiday from England. We were made to feel welcome from the start, the staff are friendly and efficient. The rooms clean and comfortable. Lovely beach views, great pool. Would recommend to anyone. We hope to visit again one day.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to come back.”
Reviews.Author: Linze52
Reviews.Content: The staff was very attentive and helpful, especially the front desk. The room were large, beds very comfortable. Our favorite part was the Happy Hour, we never missed it and would be the main reason we would come back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: kdfrench
Reviews.Content: Over the weekend of the Rolex 24 Hour Race at Daytona, we stayed at this hotel and was very pleased. The rooms were clean and comfortable. An added bonus was the refrigerator and microwave. Though the hotel is old, it appears to have been recently remodeled and is well-maintained. Breakfast in the hotel restaurant was fair. I'd certainly return! The only negative was that we'd hoped to walk to a nearby restaurant for dinner--maybe something with a beachfront view--but really didn't find anything matching that criteria. We drove 2-3 miles up the road before finding suitable options.

Reviews.Title: “Great Spot for a Business Meeting”
Reviews.Author: porkpalace
Reviews.Content: The Aku Tiki Inn was a great spot for us to meet. We had about 20 attendees and the meeting rooms worked out great. The staff was courteous and there are plenty of good restaurants within a 10-15 minute drive. It's located right on the ocean in a little quieter part of Daytona Beach just south of the "noise". I'm sure we'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “fun in the sun”
Reviews.Author: mommyanddomi
Reviews.Content: awesome..right on the ocean. convent parking and friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Another great golf trip to Daytona Beach and the Aku Tiki Best Western”
Reviews.Author: homosassagolfer
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth year our golf group of 16 couples has been to Daytona Beach for three days of golf and lots of fun. This year was the the groups third stay at the Aku Tiki and we will be back there next year for more fun and golf. The hotel is right on the ocean with lots of beautiful beach to walk on and the sounds of rolling surf to sooth your nerves after a tough day on the golf course. The staff at the Aku Tiki is always hospitable, the restaurant is very good, and the evening happy hour tops off a great day of golf.

Reviews.Title: “Good location - middle of the road hotel”
Reviews.Author: tjmcgraw
Reviews.Content: The staff were all very nice, the rooms clean, and the location was great. I would classify this hotel as a middle of the road type of hotel. The accomodations are not high end but for Daytona Beach (with it's high number of questionable hotels) this is a safe bet. The fridge and microwave were a pleasant surprise as was the free internet. The rooms kind of had a funky smell to them.... nothing a little fabreeze can't take care of (which we purchased when we were out). I stayed at The Shores a few months before, and I would say that hotel was nicer, but you probably pay a lot more too. If you are looking for an economical, safe bet..... I would recommend this hotel. Try to get one of the ground floor rooms by the pool. Nice location to sit outside. One nice-to-have amenity would be a hottub. We were looking forward to a little spa therapy after a day of golf but no hottub... bummer.

Reviews.Title: “Great family value on the beach”
Reviews.Author: mbrenner
Reviews.Content: For $100/night, this hotel directly on Daytona Beach was perfect for our 3 day getaway from the cold north family vacation in Florida. Waves for boogie boarding, shuffleboard, heated pool, and outdoor ping pong tables kept my then 6 year old son happy for days. It was hard to tear him away from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Perfect”
Reviews.Author: kbtoys928
Reviews.Content: From the moment we arrived, the hotel exceeded our expectations. Friendly staff, very clean rooms and common areas. Sparkling pool with beautifully sculptured landscaping. If you chose not to nap by the pool, you could walk a few feet to a manicured lawn with umbrella tables looking directly out onto the beach. There is also a restaruant and bar within the hotel. Very reasonable. Shuffleboard and table tennis are available outside in the pool area. We travel frequently and would highly recomnend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Staff was stellar”
Reviews.Author: cyconleyjr
