Reviews.Content: Thre staff at the hotel was very curteous, and delightful. Traders Restaurant is a pleasant place with a good cuisine. A little far from main attractions of the area but a great price. Two thumbs up!!!

Reviews.Title: “fantastic vacation”
Reviews.Author: countrydude09
Reviews.Content: our stay at the aku tiki was great ,rooms were clean and the location was good when we go back to daytona next year we will definetly stay there again we liked the happy hour at the traders resturant at the motel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent - can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: Cozzmo
Reviews.Content: What a great place! We stayed here for five nights and couldn't have asked for more. I'm not even sure where to start in terms of positives. Maybe a quick list: 1. Loved the large swimming pool. - my daughters spent more time here than the ocean 2. Free happy hour every night - can you say Bloody Mary :) 3. Resort lounge chairs, tables, and umbrellas on a lush lawn steps from the beach 4. Large rooms with mini-fridge and stovetop 5. Location - nice part of the beach. Not too many people, and few cars 6. Ocean view from any room 7. Good rates 8. Good staff The only negative I can come up with, and it's not really a negative as I gave it a 4/5 is that some areas are beginning to look a little tired and in need of some touching up. However, I can't wait to go back and visit. Loved everything about this place. You can't go wrong staying here!

Reviews.Title: “Worst mattress ever”
Reviews.Author: armymom123
Reviews.Content: We stayed here because of all the great reviews. The hotel is far from the main pier. Right across the street from a 7-11. They have a small restaurant in the hotel with a full bar and an outdoor bar by the pool area, which offered good drink specials everyday. They all needed to be remodeled, very tired decor and the outdoor bar was just a stand with a bar. They do offer plenty of lounge chairs and tables w/umbrells on the grass and then you can walk down to the beach, but get there early to hold one. The pool was very large. The hotel itself is done in a tiki decor, which wasn't bad, but the balconies offer no privacy since they are all angled to see each other. We checked in early, and asked if we could see the shuttle launch from the beach and the man said we could see it from our balcony, so then he gives us the only one with a palm tree right in front, so we couldn't see anything from it! The mattress were thin and like laying on a bed of springs with no covering. We tried both beds and they were the same. Staff was very friendly, though and they offer a free happy hour every night. This end of the beach seemed to have the older hotels and is further from all the activities down by the main pier.

Reviews.Title: “Felt like it was my own personal hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Susannakw
Reviews.Content: Would go back today if I could! Excellent staff and safe area for kids to roam! Great foilage and huge pool.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: edwcsa
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very clean and well maintained, very friendly and knowledgable staff. Free happy hour from 5:30 - 6:30 and free cookies in the morning around 8:00 to 8:15 when they are put out. at the desk. The room balconies are angled towards the ocean which makes it nice. We would definitely stay here again and will recommend this to our friends. Eric Lawrenceville, GA

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Janislin63
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I travelled to several beaches this summer. One of my most favorite places was Daytona and this hotel. Each morning I woke up, made coffee and toast and sat out on the balcony and watched numerous dolphins swim up and down the coast line. The hotel was clean, the employees were great and they gave free drinks from 5:30 to 6:30. I never ate dinner at the hotel but I did eat the breakfast buffet. I did see the food and I must say that it looked better than much of the food at the local chainfood places. Yes, I will reccommend this place and I would LOVE to go back, anytime!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: scrappingmama
Reviews.Content: The staff was great! When you walk in they make you feel like they're elated to see you. They were wonderful with our kids; we had such a nice time. The photos on here don't do the place justice. The ones on their website are much better (www.bwakutiki.com).

Reviews.Title: “The Aku Tiki Inn is a GREAT place to stay!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: BigBlueDawg
Reviews.Content: My family and friends have been staying at the Aku Tiki for several years now and each year we enjoy it even more. This is a great place for family and friends to relax and get away from it all. It has a great location and the beach is beautiful. I can't say enough about the staff at the Aku Tiki. The people who work there go out of their way to make sure your you have the best vacation you possibliy can. The manager has put together a staff who is genuinely friendly, caring and who go about their jobs in a very professional manner. The staff at the front desk was very helpful any time we needed anything. The staff works hard to ensure the entire facility is maintained. The rooms are very clean, the pool is very clean and the grounds are well kept. The hotel manager has done a great job of coordinating all of his staff. We had a great vacation and we look forward to returning again next year. Our only problem was, WE COULDN'T STAY LONGER!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best of the Best”
Reviews.Author: tomsums
Reviews.Content: If you are going to Daytona Beach, the Aku Tiki Inn is the best place to stay, hands down. Quiet, well kept, great staff, large pool, good restaurant. I will be back.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: MEADSLOVINTHESUN
Reviews.Content: was able to get us in on short notice and the rooms were excellent super clean . very nice staff. steps away from the water, pool ver clean. could not ask for a nice place to stay. would tell all family and friends to stay there if possible.thank you

Reviews.Title: “friendly outgoing staff, nice place”
Reviews.Author: AlabamaPalmtreelover
Reviews.Content: all rooms face the ocean. nice big heated pool. free cocktail hour. seven eleven right across the street. i'd go back anytime

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: Chill
Reviews.Content: When we first arrived to Daytona Beach I was a little taken aback. It was not what I expected. Very old, tired area. Few restaurants. That being said we went to our hotel. At first I thought oh, oh, maybe we made a mistake. But my fears were unjustified. Our room was nice, looking onto the pool. The staff are great! Friendly and willing to help you with whatever you need. We settled in at a table by the beach and stayed put. We ordered burgers for lunch which was a huge bargain at $8 each. We attended the happy hour, which had free drinks and had several appetizers wings being the favorite. The appetizers at happy hour were $5 each, and a great bargain again. We had the breakfast buffet at $8.95, how could we refuse? I loved the fact we could dress for the beach and stay on site to eat all of our meals. The staff were continuously cleaning and emptying the garbage receptacles. All and all it was a great place and would definitely return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel on the beach”
Reviews.Author: mhardy01
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this property for two days, April 10th through the 12th. We found this hotel after on line research and were very impressed with the other reviews on Trip Advisor. We are very pleased to echo their positive comments. This hotel mirrors their web site and advertised facilities. We had a room on the fourth floor overlooking the pool and the beach. The room was quite large and had a good sized balcony. The balconies are situated quite nicely and they feel almost private. It's quite a large well heated pool with many tables and chairs throughout the pool area. It also includes some tables and chairs that are on the grass facing the ocean. We were very impressed with the staff. Everone was very nice and helpful. My only regret is that we couldn't stay longer. We will be back on our next visit to Daytona Beach

Reviews.Title: “Always enjoyable!”
Reviews.Author: jlward75
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this hotel off-and-on for the past 7 years and have always found it very clean and the staff extremely friendly. The view from the poolside rooms are great as you can overlook the pool and get a side view of the ocean as well. Best of all - the hotel is directly on the beach and with only about 4 steps you are standing on the sand.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, relaxing hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rebic
Reviews.Content: We visit this hotel twice a year with a very large group of mostly the same people. I have yet to hear anyone complain about anything. Our purpose is to relax, have fun and enjoy the company of each of the others in our group. We all look forward to the next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to unwind and relax”
Reviews.Author: ltcvan
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed a couple of days before Easter. This was my wife and I's first time at the Aku Tiki. My daughter's family had been there before and were highly complementary and I was extremely pleased also. All employees were helpful and seemed to have our interests in mind. The pool was great and the view breathtaking. The Inn even held an Egg hunt for the kids on the Saturday before Easter. The resturant was great with a two pound crab leg special that was delicious. My wife and I will definitely return again!

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for a Reunion”
Reviews.Author: straehle
Reviews.Content: Our high school class had a reunion at Aku Tiki. It was convenient as the evening events were in the same building requiring no driving. During the day there is a large pool in the property and easy driving to other attractions in Daytona. The dining room serves a great reasonable priced buffet breakfast to get one started for a day of activity

Reviews.Title: “Second Visit...Great Resort”
Reviews.Author: nanabarb48
Reviews.Content: Previously visited 9/08 and came back 4/09. Wonderful location, clean, the MOST friendly and helpful staff. Awesome restaurant-food is always fresh and well prepared. Very reasonable prices. Had a few problem last two days...elevator quit and had to hike up and down from the 5th floor and the pillows are not good and the internet was not working.

Reviews.Title: “Great service and very pleasant relaxing atmosphere.”
Reviews.Author: wenzlc
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the clean large pool. Very nice having a separate pool for your children. The rooms were very clean and service was wonderful. Personnel are very helpful and pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel and a vacation savior!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: hatron
Reviews.Content: after having a complete disaster at the plam plaza, i've never seen such a filthy tattered hotel as the palm plaza was, the best western aku tiki came to our rescue and provided us with a very clean and modern room. thanks for all your efforts patty!!!! the aku tiki is one of the best stays we have ever had anywhere, great staff and grat hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and location, bad smell, bugs”
Reviews.Author: dreamer3825
Reviews.Content: Good things: The staff at this hotel is great. Very friendly and accomodating. The beach is right there. The happy hour is fantastic, as are the tables that look out on the beach. The mini-fridge in the room is nice, and the bathroom in the room was clean Bad things: The elevator is scary! It's really cramped and smells funny. The hallways smell really musty (the rooms weren't as bad). I enjoyed our room, until I started noticing all of the bugs in there. I had the balcony open for a little bit (to try to get some fresh air in and the musty smell gone) - so I'm not sure if they just flew in and parked on the wall, or what. There were a lot of them, however, and it seems like they had been there for a while (not just flew in). This was gross. The restaurant on site - I would not recommend it. The pool is totally outdated, and I wouldn't go in it. I don't think that this hotel should be charging the rates that it has. I have stayed at many Best Western's on the beach, (Cocoa Beach, South Beach, etc.) and have always had a clean, bug-free room. My boyfriend came home with many bites all over his body. I really liked the location and service at this hotel, I don't know if they need to have pest control come through or what. If the elevator was fixed and the musty smells gone, I may stay here again. Other that that, I would not. It's not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: “loved the hotel, even on Bike Week”
Reviews.Author: AuCaPi
Reviews.Content: this is our second stay, at the ATI, We went there on the last week end of Bike Week. Everybody know how busy ...Daytona can get on those days. well the ATI was great We booked a little last minute, I apprehended the stay because of bike week : we got a room on second flloor,view on pool and ocean accross the elevator door, obvously not the best location but QUIET QUIET QUIET We were on pool side, I don't know if the parking/ocean view is loud .the bikes are all together, but not allowed to be too loud, pool very clean and heated, beach steps away we had an efficiency room. very clean. We had to request more toilettries and towels, provided right away. Now a note on the pool: bring your own beach towel, the towel provided are pretty small and thin, I had to use 6 for me, between drying and lounging... ATI, CLEAN QUIET GREAT VIEW all on bike week... PS: We went with my husband best friend (one room for 4 people) he said that hotel was NO GOOD, BECAUSE ITS SO GREAT YOU DONT WANT TO GO ANYWHERE ELSE HAHAHAH

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great atmosphere, great staff. We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: HappyCamper099
Reviews.Content: Wow! What a great place to hold a conference for our staff. Included with the exceptional atmosphere is a hotel staff willing to go above and beyond to make sure our stay was great. They privided us with a great conference to meet and teh food was fabulous. We will be back soon...Hopefully very soon!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: SPFlorida
Reviews.Content: I did not actually stay at this hotel, but at a sister property a couple of miles away (Bahama House). I did feel compelled to write, however, because the staff at Best Western were very friendly and accomodating, as they allowed us to park our RV in their lot overnight. We did not find the Daytona Ocean Center/convention center staff to be helfpul or friendly at all, and our visit would have been ruined if it were not for the assistance of the Best Western staff. Hotel lobby was small but clean, location good, beach great. Many thanks!

Reviews.Title: “We did not lenjoy this hotel .”
Reviews.Author: UlianaCt
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Best Western Aku Tiki Inn for two nights.It was a part of family vacation .We spend a lot of time traveling. This hotel is the worst one .We arrived at 10.00 pm and there was nobody at the front desk ,we had to wait and knock for 15 min. Finally we got a room , the smell in the room (mix of smoke and old carpet ) was very strong. We asked for another room but lady at frond desk told me she will not move us from one room to another ,because they are the same. I tried to get rid of smell by keeping a window open ,it did not work.The conditioner did nor work well ,it was making a strange noise.The room was not very clean ,this hotel did not deserve rating it has.location is great ,but the other hotels a very close to each other.My advise : go to Daytona Beach,DO NOT stay in Best Western Aku Tiki Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Met all of our needs”
Reviews.Author: aicirtapc5
Reviews.Content: A few friends and I were staying at the Aku Tiki for a destination wedding. She had reserved a block of rooms at 5 Daytona hotels and we decided to go with this one. It was the cheapest and had the best reviews on Trip Advisor. The hotel was very easy to find, right on Atlantic Drive near everything the city has to offer. We didn't get to the hotel until after check-in time so our room was waiting for us. There were 4 girls staying in the same room and it was large enough for all of our bags. We had a mini-fridge and a microwave in our room for free although we didn't use it. Our beds were comfortable as well. We were on the first floor right by the pool through our sliding glass door. Each room had their own lounge chairs and the access to the ocean was easy and close. We ate the breakfast buffet one morning and it had many options for a reasonable price. The food was as well as can be expected. If you drive a car there the clerk gives you a parking pass to display in your window since parking is limited. We had fresh towels everyday and the maids were very friendly. My friend forgot her razor at home and they gave her a very expensive one for free. I was amazed that it wasn't a cheap Bic disposable. There are even free cookies in the lobby. Overall the stay was perfect for our needs. My only negative was that I always like a sink on the outside of the bathroom to expedite the "getting ready" process. I would definitely stay here again if I was on a budget trip to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “A good first impression of Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: gurk123
Reviews.Content: First Impression of hotel was positive from the moment we drove in. Great parking proximity, and a comfortable lobby. When we got to the 5th floor(top), our room was further to the end of the hallway. A smoke smell was obvious when we left the elevator, not overwhelming. Once inside our room, there was no smoke smell. A/C worked well. Good view from balcony. The room was comfortable, large enough, and had a mini-fridge and a safe, along with all other good amenities. The pool was great, huge and an 8 foot deep end. Lots of seating and great access to washrooms and laundry room. Lawn and shrubs were attractive, and access to beach was excellent. Quite a few stores located along blvd, including 7-11 across street, and gift shops near by. Haapy hour was offered, but were going out so did not partake. The guest we met on elevator was quite looking forward to attending happy hour! Overall a good stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Golf Package”
Reviews.Author: annecink
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Aku Tiki Best Western for two night in August with a group of 20 lady golfers. The golf package was great! The rooms were very nice. I don't know how they do it at the beach. Each room had a refrigerator and microwave. Some rooms had a kitchette. The bathrooms were small, but clean and adequate - lots of towels. The outdoor facilities were excellent! There was a large open cabana between the pool and the beach. It had a tiki bar (cute beachy "bucket of beer" for $12.00 - 5 beers), covered tables with lots of seating, shuffle board courts and ping pong. You could sit at the tables and see the pool, the beach and all the recreational activities. The restaurant is at the other end of the pool - handy for snacks, wings, etc. We brought our own. Our package included a continental breakfast and a cocktail hour. They have a very attractive and comfortably furnished gathering room where we would get together after dinner for games, etc. Mitch and the rest of the staff were very accomodating. Unfortunately, we were "chased out" early by tropical storm Fay. They gladly refunded the money for our second round of golf and had everything ready for us to check out right after breakfast so we could hit the road for home.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: london465
Reviews.Content: Found this hotel after some research on Trip Advisor and was really happy with it. I booked using the Hotels website and paid the cheapest rate which meant i could have ended up in any room. Lucky for me i ended up with one of the bigger rooms with the balconey looking over the pool and sea. Two double beds and a little kitchen which was great. Pool was nice and never too busy and the free cocktail hour each night was good!. Great location straight on the beach. Nothing really bad about this place about from the fact that it is a little out the way from the main part of daytona but then i thing this is the case with most of the hotels as they are all pretty spread out, so as long as you have a car or dont mind getting a cab its still a really good place to stay. Any more info needed just let me know :-)

Reviews.Title: “What a Wonderful Place”
Reviews.Author: tubemasta
Reviews.Content: My family and I just returned from 5 incredible nights at the Best Western Aku Tiki. From the moment we set foot in the beautiful lobby we were treated like family. The staff were so nice to not only my wife and I but to both my children. The rooms were spotless (even the bathroom!!). The breakfast was my kids favorite (a close second to the homemade pizza they make in their kitchen). Susie made sure we had everything we needed poolside and I must say I have never seen a pool as big as the one there not even at the country club. We were sad to leave and can not wait to go back. You sure can't beat the price for everything you get. I hope we can stay 10 days next year!

Reviews.Title: “Aku Tiki is the best”
Reviews.Author: agbear1
Reviews.Content: Another great vacation at the Aku Tiki! The staff Mitch, Bobby, Richard, and manager Dale will make you feel at home. Our girls 12 and 15 are swimmers and the pool is the best we have seen up and down the whole beach. The view of the ocean from every room is great. The kitchen is well equiped to prepare meals. Grocery store is right across the street and many restaurants are within a very short distance. Comfortable acommodations + great location + great beach + great pool = great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: DaniellesTravels
Reviews.Content: Very Clean, Nicely Remodeled, Great Location, Friendly and Helpful Manager. I don't really have any complaints. Only things I would add: free complimentary breakfast (breakfast was available in the restaurant, but I think it was $8) and a better TV (they need to upgrade them, the picture was blurry).

Reviews.Title: “A life saver!”
Reviews.Author: beachbabewannabe
Reviews.Content: After staying at a Hawaiian Inn condo that my family rented from a private owner for 5 nights, we couldnt take it any longer!! So we called up the Aku Tiki in and a very sweet and caring lady, Mitch, gave us a great rate and a great room! She had it ready in no time so we could come right over! I loved the room, it was clean, neat, well kept, had a refrigerator and stove, the hotel offers a goody bag when you check in, free happy hour and free cookies in the mornings. Not to mention the hospitality of the staff. When I return to Daytona Beach we will MOST DEFINATLY stay here! Also, the room was very quiet and the beds were comfortable.

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Aku Tiki Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2225 S Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
